attributes.action: Do everything in his power to stop innocent children getting killed in Gaza
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the war on gaza to stop. i have recently recieved disturbing images, which disgust, me and bring tears to my eyes, where innocent children are being killed. i have read in a jewish holy book, a verse " you shall not murder" and i find that the army of israel are not following their holy book. i think to my self why are the children being killed, they are innocent, over 1000 innocent people have been killed, mainly children.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
